message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product for a price of $12,000. I think it's a fair price considering its value to you, and I'm confident you'll love it. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is a bit steep for me.  I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob, but I have to make a living. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $11,000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $11,000 is still a little high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $10,500.  If you're not willing to come down to that, I'm going to have to look at other options.

I can see you're serious about getting this product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $11,200, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. It's still a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll love the product.
